nodes.documentation: extract method sig from encoded function call
nodes.name: getMethodSig

nodes.documentation:
extract parameter from encoded-function block.
see: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/abi-spec.html#formal-specification-of-the-encoding
note that the type of the parameter must be static.
the return value should be casted to the right type.
nodes.name: getParam

nodes.documentation:
extract dynamic-sized (string/bytes) parameter.
we assume that there ARE dynamic parameters, hence getParam(0) is the offset to the first
dynamic param
https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/abi-spec.html#use-of-dynamic-types
nodes.name: getBytesParam
extractUint

nodes.documentation: extract method sig from encoded function call
nodes.name: getMethodSig

nodes.documentation:
extract parameter from encoded-function block.
see: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/abi-spec.html#formal-specification-of-the-encoding
note that the type of the parameter must be static.
the return value should be casted to the right type.
nodes.name: getParam

nodes.documentation:
extract dynamic-sized (string/bytes) parameter.
we assume that there ARE dynamic parameters, hence getParam(0) is the offset to the first
dynamic param
https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/abi-spec.html#use-of-dynamic-types
nodes.name: getBytesParam
extractUint

params.source: a block of memory to extract from.

extractUint(bytes,uint256).notice: extract bytes32 block from a memory source. if offset is too large, then pad result with zeros.

getBytesParam(bytes,uint256).notice: extract dynamic-sized (string/bytes) parameter. we assume that there ARE dynamic parameters, hence getParam(0) is the offset to the first dynamic param https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/abi-spec.html#use-of-dynamic-types

getMethodSig(bytes).notice: extract method sig from encoded function call

getParam(bytes,uint256).notice: extract parameter from encoded-function block. see: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/abi-spec.html#formal-specification-of-the-encoding note that the type of the parameter must be static. the return value should be casted to the right type.
